name: Okashi Towers
storyline:
Create unique custom maps in the World Builder and and share them with your friends. Join battles with up to 8 players or NPCs in any team combination and choose one of the four factions that fits your play style best.
Gameplay
Summon tower units near your base or other tower units to increase the amount of candy resources received over time. Spend resources to summon offensive units that can be controlled individually or together as a group to find enemy units and their base.

Join players and NPCs to play together as a team or individually with many different game modes (4v4, 2v2v2v2, 8 Free For All, etc). Create custom maps using the World Builder to create a unique game experience.
summary: Okashi Towers is a Halloween inspired Real Time Strategy game with Tower Defense elements. Gather candy resources to build tower units or go on offense and summon cute creatures to attack other player bases. Join with up to 8 players and choose one of the four factions that fits your play style best
